title: XConfessions 17
overview: Every story on this digital download is inspired by a confession submitted to Erika Lust’s site XConfessions.com, where anonymous members of the public submit their wildest and most personal sexual fantasies. It has a diverse range of fantasies; lesbian erotica, a seductive femme fatale, two outdoor sex scenes, and a dreamy Erika Lust original. Included: Madly in Love With My Best Friend; Näkki; Spellbound; All Eyez On Me; La Fantasia Di Beba; Sp(l)it; Hunger.
